TEI.2.document_title: Silas Fuqua to Stephen F Austin, 03-28-1828

barker_notes.barker_summary: Silas Fuqua to Austin, March 28, 1828. Expressing satisfaction with Texas and asking for assistance and information. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 28
